dict.acceptation: 重读；[机械学]使承受压力；给…加压力（或应力）；

sent.orig: Chronic stress causes the body to produce too much of two hormones, cortisol and adrenalin.
sent.trans: 慢性的STRESS会使身体内产生过多的皮质醇和肾上腺素这两种荷尔蒙激素。

sent.orig: Radial stress, axis stress and shear stress at the critical interface regions are obtained and compared.
sent.trans: 对各情况下的轴向、径向和剪切应力做了比较分析。

sent.orig: English stresses can be divided into three levels: main stress, secondary stress and zero stress.
sent.trans: 英语的重音可分为三个级别：主重音、次重音与零重音。

sent.orig: Drought-stress, salt-stress, cold-stress strongly influence on plants among all abiotic stresses.
sent.trans: 在各种非生物胁迫逆境中，干旱胁迫、盐胁迫、低温胁迫对植物的影响尤为突出。

sent.orig: Stress concentrations can lead to initiation of cracking by fatigue, stress corrosion, or hydrogen-assisted stress corrosion.
sent.trans: 应力集中可能会导致疲劳、应力腐蚀或氢基应力腐蚀而产生裂纹。
